description: Grow Mtb in culture at saturation OD
Collect the media from Mtb culture filtrate and lyophilize
Fractionate the lyophylized filtrate accoeding to size, hydrophobic nature of proteins and peptides
Do mass spectrometry and identify the proteins and peptide sequence'
Define most abundant protein or peptide followed by its expression/synthesis
Add the synthesized peptide/protein to macrophagre cell culture and study cell phenotype
Collect the macrophages for different period of time after trearment by protein/peptide
Fractionate cells and collect cytosolic proteins, nucleus and membranes
Prepare DNA and RNA samples from treated cells and study the base modifications by massspectrometery
Perform RNAseq and find out the changes in trnscription after macrophages treatment by peptide/protein
